mapper.select: SELECT S.SLIP_CODE, S.DIVISION, S.SLIP_DATE, S.EVIDENCE_CODE, S.SUPPLY_VALUE, S.VALUE_TAX, V.VENDER_NAME, E.EVIDENCE FROM SLIP S JOIN JOURNALIZE J ON(S.SLIP_CODE = J.SLIP_CODE) JOIN VENDER V ON(V.VENDER_CODE = J.VENDER_CODE) JOIN EVIDENCE E ON(E.EVIDENCE_CODE = S.EVIDENCE_CODE) WHERE S.COM_CODE = 42 AND SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(S.SLIP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) = 2020 AND (J.SLIP_CODE, J.PRICE) IN (SELECT SLIP_CODE, MIN(PRICE) FROM (SELECT SLIP_CODE, PRICE, JOURNAL_CODE FROM JOURNALIZE WHERE (SLIP_CODE, PRICE) NOT IN (SELECT SLIP_CODE, MIN(PRICE) FROM JOURNALIZE GROUP BY SLIP_CODE)) GROUP BY SLIP_CODE) AND S.SLIP_DIVISION = '매입매출' ORDER BY S.SLIP_DATE DESC

SELECT S.SLIP_CODE, S.DIVISION, TO_CHAR(S.SLIP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SLIP_DATE, S.EVIDENCE_CODE, S.SUPPLY_VALUE, S.VALUE_TAX, V.VENDER_NAME, E.EVIDENCE FROM SLIP S JOIN JOURNALIZE J ON(S.SLIP_CODE = J.SLIP_CODE) JOIN VENDER V ON(V.VENDER_CODE = J.VENDER_CODE) JOIN EVIDENCE E ON(E.EVIDENCE_CODE = S.EVIDENCE_CODE) WHERE S.COM_CODE = 42 AND SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(S.SLIP_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) = 2020 AND (J.SLIP_CODE, J.PRICE) IN (SELECT SLIP_CODE, MIN(PRICE) FROM (SELECT SLIP_CODE, PRICE, JOURNAL_CODE FROM JOURNALIZE WHERE (SLIP_CODE, PRICE) NOT IN (SELECT SLIP_CODE, MIN(PRICE) FROM JOURNALIZE GROUP BY SLIP_CODE)) GROUP BY SLIP_CODE) AND S.SLIP_DIVISION = '매입매출' AND S.SLIP_DATE BETWEEN #{date1} AND #{date2} ORDER BY S.SLIP_DATE DESC

SELECT J.JOURNAL_CODE, J.SLIP_CODE, J.DEBIT_CREDIT, J.PRICE, J.ACCOUNT_CODE, J.VENDER_CODE, V.VENDER_NAME, A.ACCOUNT_TITLE FROM JOURNALIZE J JOIN VENDER V ON(J.VENDER_CODE = V.VENDER_CODE) JOIN ACCOUNT_TITLE A ON(A.ACCOUNT_CODE = J.ACCOUNT_CODE) WHERE SLIP_CODE = #{slipCode}
